gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [630-114] S1203 should be equal to S0103+S0203+S0303+S0403+S0503+S0603+S0703+S0803+S0903+S1003+S1103 with margin of error [1] {{abs([630-114:R12C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$a}) - [630-114:R1C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$b}) + [630-114:R2C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$c}) + [630-114:R3C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$d}) + [630-114:R4C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$e}) + [630-114:R5C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$f}) + [630-114:R6C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$g}) + [630-114:R7C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$h}) + [630-114:R8C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$i}) + [630-114:R9C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$j}) + [630-114:R10C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$k}) + [630-114:R11C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$l})) <= 1}}
